module: Module-level comment: This module, cmd_prbs_gen, generates pseudorandom binary sequences (PRBS) for tasks like addresses or instructions using linear feedback shift registers (LFSRs). Inputs control the clock signal ('clk_i'), seed initialization ('prbs_seed_init'), clock enable ('clk_en'), and seed input ('prbs_seed_i') while the output port ('prbs_o') emits the PRBS. Based on the 'PRBS_CMD' and 'PRBS_WIDTH' parameters, the module selects and implements the generation of either a 64-bit, 32-bit, or 20-bit sequence using conditionally executed generate-if blocks. The sequences are then assigned to the output port for external use.
